dialogue.sentence: Long ago, this world witnessed a terrible war...
One that would shake the foundations of all that was known beforehand.
This war was between none other, than the mages and the mageless.
The mages did well at first, but were eventually overrun by technological advancements.
Eventually, the mages would get desperate, and would resort to summoning a terribly powerful creature.
This creature rampaged across our realm, killing any in it's path.
